author: dougm
msg: no point in merging things which are not set until after merge happens.
make a note of those which are set during module init.

author: dougm
msg: 'ctx' traditionally refers to an SSL_CTX.  change modssl_ctx_t

author: bnicholes
msg: Stop the while loop from incrementing twice per iteration before checking for
the NULL terminator.  This was causing the while loop to walk off the end of any
string with an odd number of characters.
